description: Roman Heart & Koen Bradshaw. Roman plays a very demanding boss who's always had his eye on his assistant. Using subterfuge he sends his lackie to the supply closet to fetch some paper clips. Unaware of the ruse, Koen falls into the trap. Once cornered, he protests but quickly succumbs, ensuring his superior gets the treatment he insists upon. Luckily for Koen, the perks are equally rewarding as the boss responds in kind.
title: Overtime
